title: @Riot: Project Wards are bugged or intented to have this advantage/disadvantage?

embed.description: Preview video for the upcoming Optic Enhancer Ward skin. For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights Facebook for all you FB Users who want to keep upto date: https://www.facebook.com/Skinspotlights

body:
The health bar is in the green/purple glow, which makes it very hard to see how many hp the ward has. Is this intented or a bug?

Other wards have the hp bar above the green/purple glow, as can be seen here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P6HwnfT5UTA
